prompt.content: What was the year-over-year percentage change in Deferred revenue for FY 2022 to FY 2023 for Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL)? Using Appleâ€™s Form 10-K, express your answer as a % rounded to 2 decimal places.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Deferred Revenue for FY 2023 = $8,061M","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Deferred Revenue for FY 2022 = $7,912M"},{"criteria":"Deferred revenue 2023 - Deferred Revenue 2022 = $8,061M - $7,912M = $149M","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Year-over-year percentage = ($149M/$7,912M)*100 = 1.88%"}]
